members.name: Terminal Wizard
members.description: A personal website focused on programming tutorials, tech experiments, and digital explorations.
members.bio: I've been creating websites since the early 2000s and have a passion for clean, minimal designs with a focus on content.

members.name: Pixel Pioneer
members.description: A retro-themed website dedicated to pixel art, game development, and the aesthetics of early computing.
members.bio: Nostalgic web developer with a passion for pixels and old-school computing.
